LOOK
Usage: look look [in | at] [the] <item> look <direction>
For studying your surroundings.
Examples:
> look > look AT the angel > look IN the bag > look south (May give some information as to what is south)
Note that if you LOOK AT CORPSE you will not see its inventory. To see what's inside a container (i.e. a corpse) use LOOK IN <object>.
See also: EXAMINE, GET, READ, TAKE
